attributes.action: PUBLISH GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENT SPENDING REVIEW IN MARCH 2010 AS HE IS HONOUR BOUND TO DO SO BEFORE A GENERAL ELECTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The intention to delay publishing Government Spending Review set for March 2010 until after the election is:
* an unprecendented delay
* undemocratic
* hiding the true state of UK economy
* hiding from the electrorate what the spending budget will be and nature of cuts before election
* delay was announced by Peter Mandelson who is an unelected person in parliament
